sentence.Network_en: Both my parents were devout Anglicans.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的父母都是虔诚的圣公会教徒。
她是一个虔诚的基督徒。

sentence.Network_en: She is a devout Roman Catholic.

list.abs: no wonder an American recordr and journalist say , " I arrived ITe an atheist and departed a devout believer . "难怪一位北美作家兼采访者说：“我来那里时还得个无神论者，离开时却是个虔诚的信徒了。”

the son of a retired marine , Bernard , from New Portland in rural Maine , was described as a devout Christian , an Iraq war veteran , a keen snowboarder and an avid hiker .伯纳德是退役海军陆战队士兵的儿子，来缅因州农村的纽波特兰，被形容为一个虔诚的基督徒、伊拉克战争老兵、喜爱滑雪还是个狂热的徒步旅行者。
The devout Christian persists in his belief ., 那个虔诚的基督教徒坚持他的信念.

those devout traders , called' Wali Ullah' or' those to God ,' energetically both trade and religion by adapting their appeals to the native mysticism of Java .这些虔诚的商人，叫做WaliUllah，或者“接近主的人”，把他们的祈求呼吁跟爪哇当地的神秘主义相结合。他们通过这一途径积极热情地拓展商业买卖和宗教信仰。
my sister was a devout catholic ., 我妹妹是个虔诚的天主教徒.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French devot, from Latin devotus 'devoted', past participle of devovere (see devote)

entry.def: A devout person has deep religious beliefs.

example.tran: 她是一个虔诚的基督徒。

example.ex: His devout Catholicism appeals to ordinary people.
example.tran: 他对天主教的虔诚信仰感染了普通民众。

entry.def: If you describe someone as a devout supporter or a devout opponent of something, you mean that they support it enthusiastically or oppose it strongly.

auth_sentence.content: She was devout in religion,...dextrous in business.

sentences.cn: 那位虔诚的男士每天都祈祷。

sentences.en: His grandfather is a devout Buddhist.
sentences.cn: 他的爷爷是一个虔诚的佛教徒。
